description: Test fixture PDF forms for the Plume PDF form filler tool

forms.description: IRS Form W-9: Request for Taxpayer Identification Number and Certification
forms.notes: XFA-based AcroForm. Fields use generic names (f1_01, c1_1). Name=f1_01, Business name=f1_02, Federal tax classification=c1_1[0-6], Exempt payee code=f1_03, FATCA code=f1_04, Address=f1_07/f1_08, Requester info=f1_09, SSN=f1_10/f1_11/f1_12, EIN=f1_13/f1_14.

forms.description: IRS Form W-4: Employee's Withholding Certificate
forms.notes: XFA-based AcroForm. Step1a contains name/address fields (f1_01-f1_04), SSN=f1_05, filing status checkboxes=c1_1[0-2], Step2 checkbox=c1_2[0], dollar amount fields for Steps 3-4.

forms.description: USCIS Form I-9: Employment Eligibility Verification
expected_fields: Last Name Family Name from Section 1
First Name Given Name from Section 1
Employee Other Last Names Used (if any)
3 A lawful permanent resident Enter USCIS or ANumber
Preparer or Translator Last Name (Family Name) 0
forms.notes: Employment eligibility form with human-readable field names. Section 1 for employee info, Section 2 for employer review of identity documents (List A, B, C). Contains dropdowns for document selection.

forms.description: OPM Standard Form 86: Questionnaire for National Security Positions (US security clearance)
forms.notes: Extremely large form (136 pages, 6197 fields). The most complex AcroForm in the test suite. Covers personal history, employment, education, foreign contacts, financial records, etc. XFA-based with hierarchical field names. Good stress test for form filler tools.

forms.description: Canada Revenue Agency Form TD1: Personal Tax Credits Return
forms.notes: Graphical PDF with no interactive AcroForm fields. Fields are drawn as rectangles/lines in the page content. Visual labels include: Last name, First name, Date of birth, Address, Basic personal amount, Age amount, etc. Good test case for OCR/visual field detection.

forms.description: Bundesagentur fur Arbeit KG1-en: Application for Child Benefit (Kindergeld) - English version
forms.notes: Bilingual German/English form from the Federal Employment Agency. XFA-based with German field names (Telefon, Steuer-ID, Name, Vorname, Geburtsdatum, Geburtsort). Tests non-ASCII field processing. Labels are in both German and English.

forms.description: German Embassy Schengen Visa Application Form (German-English bilingual)
forms.notes: Graphical PDF with no interactive fields. Bilingual German/English Schengen visa application with fields drawn as visual rectangles. Contains boxes for: Surname, First name, Date of birth, Place of birth, Nationality, Sex, Marital status, National identity number, Type of travel document, Passport number, etc. Good test case for bilingual form field detection.

forms.description: Agencia Tributaria Modelo MI: Formulario de alta para solicitud de informacion (Spanish Tax Agency registration form)
expected_fields: Nombre y apellidos del titular del órgano
APELLIDOS Y NOMBRE PERSONA DE CONTACTO
forms.notes: Spanish-language AcroForm with field names in Spanish (NIF, Apellidos, Municipio, Provincia, etc.). Tests non-ASCII characters in field names (accented characters). Administrative registration form for requesting tax information.

forms.description: EU External Action Service: Schengen Visa Application Form (EU standard)
forms.notes: Official EU Schengen visa application form. Graphical PDF with no interactive fields. A compact 2-page form with 37 numbered sections including: Surname, First name, Date of birth, Place of birth, Current nationality, Sex, Marital status, National identity number, Type of travel document, Number of travel document, Purpose of journey, etc.

forms.description: Ministere des Affaires Etrangeres: Demande de visa Schengen (French Schengen visa form)
forms.notes: French Ministry of Foreign Affairs Schengen visa application. Graphical PDF with no interactive fields. Labels in French: Nom, Prenom, Date de naissance, Lieu de naissance, Nationalite actuelle, Sexe, Etat civil, Numero de la carte d'identite nationale, Type de document de voyage, etc. Tests French-language form recognition.

forms.description: OpenOffice.org sample AcroForm PDF with diverse field types (text, combo, list, checkbox)
forms.notes: Clean, simple test form with human-readable field names and diverse AcroForm field types: text fields (/Tx), combo boxes (/Ch), list boxes (/Ch), and checkboxes (/Btn). Ideal baseline test case for form filling. Single page, easy to validate.

forms.description: HM Courts & Tribunals Service Form N285: Affidavit of Service (UK court form)
expected_fields: I: name and occupation of deponent
Make oath and say as follows:
forms.notes: UK court service form with simple, human-readable field names. Small number of fields (8 total). Contains a Reset form button (/Btn type). Good test for legal/court form category. Labels match standard UK legal terminology.
